title: Python
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20130923035336/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Software](http://web.archive.org/web/20130923035336/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Software) : Python**

Python is a programming language developed by [Guido van Rossum](http://web.archive.org/web/20130923035336/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Guido%20van%20Rossum). It was designed to be simple and easy to use and understand. It is used in various type design applications, most notably as the primary macro language for [FontLab](http://web.archive.org/web/20130923035336/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FontLab). Other tools have been written in python such as [RoboFab](http://web.archive.org/web/20130923035336/http:/typophile.com/wiki/RoboFab).

**See also:** [Python\_How-To](http://web.archive.org/web/20130923035336/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Python_How-To), [Python Scripts](http://web.archive.org/web/20130923035336/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Python%20Scripts).
author: filip blazek
